title: srI raama raama shrithulamu
sahitya:
shrI rAma rma shritulamu gAmA nEramA brOva bhAramA

caraNam 1

 manasA nA mATa vini sAreku mukti ganumi mancidanumi
   
caraNam 2

 paluvidha karmambula andu marmamu delusukO harini galusukO
   
caraNam 3


 lOkulu tama trOva Ekamanduru oppu kOkavE mOsabOkavE
   
caraNam 4

 mATi mATiki nUnE rOTi eddulu tirugu dhATirA mATa mE pATirA
   
caraNam 5

 A matamula andu nEmamu satyamu EmarabOku pAmara
   
caraNam 6

 gatyantaramu lEdu pratyEkamuna jUDu nityuni krta krtyuni
   
caraNam 7

 toli bhava nATakamula jEyu pApamu tolagunu sukhamu kalugunu
   
caraNam 8

 nA delpun anuNDu shrIduni manasendu mIdanO evari bOdhanO
   
caraNam 9

 jADa delusukoni vEDukonna nannu jUDaDu mATADaDu
 
caraNam 10

 krOdha lObhamulatO bAdhincina ArAdhanO lEka shOdhanO
 
caraNam 11

 sadayuni ciru navvu vadanuni pada bhakti vadalanu endu kadlanu
 
caraNam 12

 nEmamuga toli nOmuna dorikina rAmuni jitakAmuni
 
caraNam 13

 shIluni sadguNa shAlini jUcuTE cAlunu anya mElanu
 
caraNam 14

 valarAja janakuni valacudunani pEra golutunu yamuni gelutunu
 
caraNam 15

 nA jayamunu tyAgarAjuni rAjAdhi rAjaunaku gUrtu rAjini
